sentences.en: A long raised scar ran across his brown chest and down into his heavily muscled abdomen.
sentences.cn: 一道长长的隆起伤疤越过褐色的胸脯一直伸到肌肉发达的腹部底下.

sentences.en: A thin, hollow needle was carefully introduced into the patient's abdomen.
sentences.cn: 一根细空心针被小心地插入病人腹部.

sentences.en: Blunt force is applied to the abdomen.
sentences.cn: 钝性的力量作用于腹部.

sentences.en: He felt a great deal of pain in his abdomen.
He reposited the stomach in teh abdomen.
He was suffering from pains in his abdomen.
He went into the hospital to undergo tests for a pain in his abdomen.
sentences.cn: 他去了医院接受对他的腹部疼痛进行的各项检查。

sentences.en: If she could only get one deep breath, way down in her abdomen.
sentences.cn: 她要是能够深深吸一口气, 一直吸到肚子里,那该多舒服啊!

sentences.en: Percussion of the abdomen is often omitted.
The abdomen is supple without masses or organomegaly.
sentences.cn: 腹部是柔软的,无肿块或脏器肿大.

sentences.en: The body is usually divided into cephalothorax and abdomen.
sentences.cn: 体躯通常分为头胸部和腹部两部分.

sentences.en: The head, chest, and abdomen were still sanctuaries not to be opened, unless by accident.
sentences.cn: 头颅 、 胸腔和腹腔除意外事故外, 仍属不能切开的禁区.

sentences.en: The nurse tapped the patient's abdomen.
The patient is complaining of pain in the abdomen, doctor.
sentences.cn: 大夫, 病人在叫肚子疼.

words.tran_cn: 腹壁整形术；腹部去脂术；腹壁成形术

trans.tran_en: the part of your body between your chest and legs which contains your stomach,  bowel s  etc
